sourcesContent:
export default function Achievements() { const achievements = [ { position: "1", title: "1st Place – College Hackathon", description: "Spearheaded a team to design a responsive fitness web app using machine learning for real-time personalized health insights.", bgClass: "bg-blue-50", borderClass: "border-blue-600", badgeBgClass: "bg-blue-100", badgeTextClass: "text-blue-600", titleClass: "text-blue-800" }, { position: "1st", title: "Debate Champion – College Level", description: "Emerged as the top debater among 30+ students, demonstrating strong logical reasoning and persuasive communication.", bgClass: "bg-purple-50", borderClass: "border-purple-600", badgeBgClass: "bg-purple-100", badgeTextClass: "text-purple-600", titleClass: "text-purple-800" }, { position: "2nd", title: "Runner-Up – Maths Wonder", description: "Engineered a precision-based origami model by applying geometric and algebraic principles, highlighting strong mathematical reasoning.", bgClass: "bg-green-50", borderClass: "border-green-600", badgeBgClass: "bg-green-100", badgeTextClass: "text-green-600", titleClass: "text-green-800" } ]; return (

Achievements

{achievements.map((achievement, index) => (
{achievement.position}

{achievement.title}

{achievement.description}

))}
); }
